body:
## Expected Behavior
After creating a "reset" batch operation, call `DescribeBatchOperation` API and receive the batch reset operation you just created.

## Actual Behavior
After creating a "reset" batch operation, call `DescribeBatchOperation` API and receive a 400 Bad Request response, with error message `"The operation type reset is not supported"`

https://github.com/temporalio/temporal/blob/main/service/frontend/workflow_handler.go#L3536-L3547

## Steps to Reproduce the Problem

  1. Create a "reset" batch operation
  1. Call DescribeBatchOperations API with that batch operation

## Specifications

  - Version: 1.22.0
  - Platform: All
title: `DescribeBatchOperation` API does not return "reset" type batch operations
